title: An extremely residential 20 perches Land in Pelawatta
details:
This is a fantastic opportunity to invest Land.

Pelawatta, Wickramasinghapura 1st lane.

An extremely residential 20 perches square Land with road frontage and gated access Road.

200 m from Boralla Bus route.

Rs.145,0000 per perch.

Best & Final offers close Deal.

Don’t miss valuable opportunity.
